title: About Us
aboutText: PT Equityworld Futures ("EWF") is committed to being the best investment partner in the futures trading sector. With excellent service, EWF continues to expand and now has a network of 7 operational offices in Jakarta (2 offices), Surabaya (2 offices), Semarang, Manado, and Cirebon.
aboutText2: Established in 2005, PT Equityworld Futures is an official broker member registered with the Commodity Futures Trading Regulatory Agency (BAPPEBTI), Jakarta Futures Exchange (BBJ), and Indonesia Clearing House (Persero).
ctaText: Join thousands of investors who have entrusted their investments to us.
